__e: Since we're discussing it, I might as well tell you that... yes, I have been unfaithful to you once, and, yes, it was only the once and, no, I haven't been tempted to since and I don't think I will be now.
I know rushing forward may be tempting, but it's important to give yourself time. - You've just begun a journey that could take years.
What a temptation! Be able to go down and feel the soil under my feet to run !
And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil, for thine is the kingdom, and the power, and the glory, forever and ever.
We can resist any temptation, but what if we're doing it to save our own souls when we could be saving the world?
And lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil, for Thine is the kingdom and the power and the glory forever.
I indulged in temptation and risked my sister's life.
No, temptation's around all of us, and it's everywhere.
You know, when you see a dead cat in the road and you don't want to look at it, but then the more you try to stop yourself, the more that you just can't help it.
